title: improve new user onboarding
summary: Created new /setup onboarding page for new users with improved initial experience
Enhanced first-time user flow to provide more guided initial interaction
Implemented initial routing for new user setup process

suggestedTasks.title: Implement User Onboarding Interactive Walkthrough
suggestedTasks.description: Design and create an interactive step-by-step onboarding tutorial for first-time users. The walkthrough should guide users through creating their first project, understanding key UI elements, and demonstrating core product capabilities. Focus on creating an engaging, informative initial experience that reduces user friction and increases product understanding.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current onboarding needs more depth and user engagement

suggestedTasks.title: Add Comprehensive Onboarding User Experience Tests
suggestedTasks.description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the new user onboarding flow. Include integration tests that simulate first-time user interactions, validate routing logic, and ensure all critical paths work smoothly. Tests should cover various scenarios like user with no projects, different device types, and potential error conditions.
suggestedTasks.reason: Lack of existing tests for new onboarding implementation

gotchas: Ensure onboarding is lightweight and quick
